description: Sun-filled Chelsea studio with minimal and airy design ready to welcome anyone to feel at home. My place is close to Chelsea Market, High Line Park, Westville Chelsea, Café Grumpy, Chelsea Piers, A/C/E, L, F/M trains (two stops from Times Sq and the Theatre district). You’ll love my place because of the high ceilings, the clean decor, the sunlight, the location, the convenience, the cafes, bars and restaurants nearby. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
name: Large, Sunny Studio in the heart of Chelsea.
review: Eunice was communicative and accessible. Her apartment was very clean with all the amenities you'd need. It was also bigger than we expected for the price and is in a great location. She even left some delicious home baked bread for us. Highly recommended!
